name: Doomsmass - Voxel Dungeon Crawler
description:
Hello, we are a bunch of high school students living in Australia who greatly enjoy playing and making games and after having a lot of fun last year decided to compete in the Jingle Jam Game Jam once again. Our game is a doom style fps dungeon-crawler incorporating a bunch of the modifiers throughout the game and utilizing the theme of 'Suprise' through many chests and random surprises. The modifiers we included were

 - Xephos and Honeydew - Make a game that involves digging. Through the progression through the levels of 'digging' through

- Landlord's Super - Your character can drink a nice, cold pint. Through the health and stamina consumable.

- Caveblazers  - Live. Die. Repeat. Will would love it if you made a roguelike! Through the roguelike gameplay and levels.

- Drink More Glurp - Put some aliens in it! (Through the enemies in the form of robotic aliens)

Credit to:

Sox#5587 - Developer

Skiddlez#2402 - Developer

Megzie#9899 - Music Composer

Open Game Art - Assets https://opengameart.org/

SoundBible - Audio http://soundbible.com/

Maxparata - Enemy Models https://maxparata.itch.io/voxel-mechas

theodd1in - Christmas Models https://theodd1in.itch.io/xmas

Made in Unreal Engine 4
